com.dsi.ant.message

Class AntMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dsi.ant.message.AntMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntMessageFromAnt, AntMessageFromHost

    public abstract class AntMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Common definitions for messages from ANT and from Host.
